content:

### Adverse Events

- AE ID: AE-0112, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin

### Protocol Deviations

- PD ID: PD-058, Description: Blood draw outside protocol-specified fasting window, Severity: minor, Site: site_08

### Investigator Notes
- Query resolution rate at 94%
- Central lab results received within 48h turnaround
- IRB approved protocol amendment v4.0; all sites notified
- Statin co-administered subjects transitioning off statins per amended protocol

### Events
- IVRS system update deployed, randomization unaffected
- Site 10 pharmacy temperature log reviewed: compliant
- Protocol amendment v4.0 approved; site distribution initiated

### Notes
- Week 27: Protocol amendment v4.0 under IRB review/approval. Statin subjects transitioning.
